body:
> try accessing
> https://golang.org/doc/install?download=go1.6.2.windows-amd64.msi
> to see them (and cancel the download of the msi file).

Found it. Thank you.

Perhaps, for a new user, we should just say
```
C:\> set GOPATH=c:\a
```
and mention that the `c:\a` directory can be anywhere.

Also I don's see why (for a first time user) we need %GOPATH%\src\github.com\user\hello. It can just be %GOPATH%\src\hello.

Alex
